languages.text: На планете потерпел крушение корабль чартиста, полный ценных грузов. Законоводы спорят, есть ли у Вольного Торговца право претендовать на груз, местные жители готовятся к грабежу, а выжившие члены экипажа — к обороне.

A Chartist ship loaded with valuable cargo has crash-landed on the planet. While legal scholars are divided on the legitimacy of the Rogue Trader's claim on the cargo, the local inhabitants are already preparing to loot the vessel and the crew is bracing itself for a bitter defence.
languages.original_text: На планете потерпел крушение корабль чартиста, полный ценных грузов. Законоводы спорят, есть ли у Вольного Торговца право претендовать на груз, местные жители готовятся к грабежу, а выжившие члены экипажа — к обороне.

traits.locale_text: A Chartist ship loaded with valuable cargo has crash-landed on the planet. While students of law are divided on whether the Rogue Trader has a claim to the cargo, the local residents are already preparing to loot the vessel and the crew is bracing itself for a bitter defence.
A ship full of people and cargo crashed on the planet. Lawyers are wondering if you have a claim to the lost ship...

A Chartist ship loaded with valuable cargo has crash-landed on the planet. While legal scholars are divided on the legitimacy of the Rogue Trader's claim on the cargo, the local inhabitants are already preparing to loot the vessel and the crew is bracing itself for a bitter defence.
A ship full of people and cargo crashed on the planet. Lawspeakers are wondering if you have a claim to the lost ship...

A Chartist ship loaded with valuable cargo has crash-landed on the planet. While legal scholars are divided on the legitimacy of the Rogue Trader's claim on the cargo, the local inhabitants are already preparing to loot the vessel and the crew is bracing itself for a bitter defence.

languages.text: Le vaisseau d'un cartographe chargé de précieuses marchandises s'est écrasé sur la planète. Si les juristes sont divisés quant à la légitimité des prétentions {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} à s'en emparer, les habitants se préparent déjà à piller ses cales et l'équipage les attend de pied ferme.
languages.original_text: A Chartist ship loaded with valuable cargo has crash-landed on the planet. While legal scholars are divided on the legitimacy of the Rogue Trader's claim on the cargo, the local inhabitants are already preparing to loot the vessel and the crew is bracing itself for a bitter defence.

traits.locale_text: Le vaisseau d'un cartographe chargé de précieuses marchandises s'est écrasé sur la planète. Si les juristes sont divisés quant à la légitimité des prétentions {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} à s'en emparer, les habitants se préparent déjà à piller ses cales et l'équipage les attend de pied ferme.

languages.text: 貴重な貨物を積んだチャーティストの船がこの惑星に不時着した。法律家たちは、その船に対する自由開拓者の請求権について真っ二つに分かれているが、現地の住民たちはすでに略奪の準備をしており、クルーたちは厳しい防衛戦に備えている。
languages.original_text: A Chartist ship loaded with valuable cargo has crash-landed on the planet. While legal scholars are divided on the legitimacy of the Rogue Trader's claim on the cargo, the local inhabitants are already preparing to loot the vessel and the crew is bracing itself for a bitter defence.

traits.locale_text: 貴重な貨物を積んだチャーティストの船がこの惑星に不時着した。法律家たちは、その船に対する自由開拓者の請求権について真っ二つに分かれているが、現地の住民たちはすでに略奪の準備をしており、クルーたちは厳しい防衛戦に備えている。

languages.text: 一艘载有贵重货物的宪章货船坠毁在这颗行星上。坠毁货船中的货物是否应为行商浪人所有？针对这个问题，法律学者的看法存在分歧，但当地居民已经做好了洗劫货船的准备，而幸存的船员也准备还以颜色。
languages.original_text: A Chartist ship loaded with valuable cargo has crash-landed on the planet. While legal scholars are divided on the legitimacy of the Rogue Trader's claim on the cargo, the local inhabitants are already preparing to loot the vessel and the crew is bracing itself for a bitter defence.

traits.locale_text: 一艘载有贵重货物的宪章货船坠毁在这颗行星上。坠毁货船中的货物是否应为行商浪人所有？针对这个问题，法律学者的看法存在分歧，但当地居民已经做好了洗劫货船的准备，而幸存的船员也准备还以颜色。

languages.text: Una nave cartista con un valioso cargamento ha realizado un aterrizaje forzoso en el planeta. Mientras los expertos en legislación están divididos sobre la legitimidad de la declaración de propiedad de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, la población ya se está preparando para saquear la nave y la tripulación se mentaliza para una defensa desesperada.
languages.original_text: A Chartist ship loaded with valuable cargo has crash-landed on the planet. While legal scholars are divided on the legitimacy of the Rogue Trader's claim on the cargo, the local inhabitants are already preparing to loot the vessel and the crew is bracing itself for a bitter defence.

traits.locale_text: Una nave cartista con un valioso cargamento ha realizado un aterrizaje forzoso en el planeta. Mientras los expertos en legislación están divididos sobre la legitimidad de la declaración de propiedad de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, la población ya se está preparando para saquear la nave y la tripulación se mentaliza para una defensa desesperada.

languages.text: Ein Chartisten-Schiff voller wertvoller Fracht ist auf dem Planeten abgestürzt. Die Rechtsgelehrten sind sich zwar nicht einig, ob {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ein Anrecht auf die Fracht hat, doch die Einheimischen rüsten sich bereits, das Schiff zu plündern. Dessen Crew bereitet sich darauf vor, erbitterten Widerstand zu leisten.
languages.original_text: A Chartist ship loaded with valuable cargo has crash-landed on the planet. While legal scholars are divided on the legitimacy of the Rogue Trader's claim on the cargo, the local inhabitants are already preparing to loot the vessel and the crew is bracing itself for a bitter defence.

traits.locale_text: Ein Chartisten-Schiff voller wertvoller Fracht ist auf dem Planeten abgestürzt. Die Rechtsgelehrten sind sich zwar nicht einig, ob {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ein Anrecht auf die Fracht hat, doch die Einheimischen rüsten sich bereits, das Schiff zu plündern. Dessen Crew bereitet sich darauf vor, erbitterten Widerstand zu leisten.

languages.text: Değerli kargoyla dolu bir Haritacı Gemisi gezegene çakıldı. Yerli âlimler, Hür Tacir'in kargo üzerinde hak iddia edişinin meşruiyetine dair ikiye ayrıldı. Bu sırada gezegenin sakinleri, gemiyi yağmalama çalışmalarına hâlihazırda başlamış. Mürettebat ise amansız bir savunmaya hazırlanıyor.
languages.original_text: A Chartist ship loaded with valuable cargo has crash-landed on the planet. While legal scholars are divided on the legitimacy of the Rogue Trader's claim on the cargo, the local inhabitants are already preparing to loot the vessel and the crew is bracing itself for a bitter defence.
